        public TextRange shiftIndentInsideRange(ASTNode node,
                                        TextRange textRange,
                                        int shift)
        Description copied from interface: FormattingModel
        Indents every line except for the first in the specified text range representing a multiline block by the specified amount.
        Specified by:
        shiftIndentInsideRange in interface FormattingModel
        Overrides:
        shiftIndentInsideRange in class PsiBasedFormattingModel
        Parameters:
        node - the owner of the text range, if defined.
        textRange - the text range to indent.
        shift - the amount by which every line should be indented.
        Returns:
        the text range covering the block with added indents.
